responses.title: That which passes beyond the veil must forever stay.
No soul may elude my gaze.
I am the unyielding face of death.
I am the guardian of the veil.
None may flee death for long.

Losing a Charge on Gravekeeper's Cloak

responses.title: There is much still to be done.
Mm mm mm ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Mm mm ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
You will go to the Maze.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
You should not be here, Razor.
Keep out of this realm, Razor.
If you are here, who now watches the maze?
Do not forget your purpose, Razor.
I will unmake your master's work, Lifestealer.
Your death comes at last, Clinkz.
The cold cannot hide you from me, Lich.
Go back to hell again. Again!
Those souls are not your plaything, Fiend.
Even a well-hidden soul can be found.
I shall take you beyond the veil, Death Prophet.
At last you bow before me, Ostarion.
Behold the world beyond the veil.
Invoker. Long has the Underscape desired to meet you.
They will not escape us, Razor.
What are you doing here Lion?!
That which has never lived, cannot die.
The hereafter is not for the likes of me.
The mortal plane must bear me once more.
Death has no hold on me.
I have watched the dead cross over for an eternity. Many have I seen pass below, and beyond: kings and tyrants, peasants and knights, creatures large and small.
To oppose me is to deny death.
Once a mortal passes beyond the veil, they may never return.
It is one thing to animate a corpse from beneath the ground. It is another to rip a soul from beyond the veil.
I do not require gold. Only tools.
It was not yours to take.
In an eternity of watching, I have seen none like it.
The Underscape holds no such treasures!

responses.title: Victory is as inevitable as death. This one is in the bag.

I will return to my eternal vigil, that no more may escape.
